General.Name: Lanpec Technologies Ltd
General.Description: Lanpec Technologies Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of petroleum and petrochemical equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers welded plate-and-sheet, feed/effluent plate, and non-feed/effluent plate shell heat exchangers; welded plate, and plate and frame heat exchangers; overhead plate condensers; welded plate-and-block heat exchanger, air coolers, and air preheaters; and shell and tube, and high-pressure hydrogenating heat exchangers. It also provides separators, desalters and dehydrators, PIG launcher and receivers, mounted skids, storage and spherical tanks, and other upstream and downstream equipment. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. Lanpec Technologies Limited is a subsidiary of China Energy Engineering Group Co., Ltd.
